original_text: Now the Lord provided a huge fish to swallow Jonah, and Jonah was in the belly of the fish three days and three nights.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이미 큰 물고기를 예비하사 요나를 삼키게 하셨으므로 요나가 밤낮 삼 일을 물고기 뱃속에 있으니라

sentences.original_text: Now the Lord provided a huge fish
and Jonah was in the belly of the fish
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요나는 물고기의 배 속에 있었는데
